channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Sphere
channel.desc: Jason Evert, founder of the Chastity Project, along with author Mary Rick Hasson and Fr. Shenan Boquet provide advice for parents discussing human sexuality with their children. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Faith In The Heartland: Revisited
channel.desc: As the National Eucharistic Pilgrimage comes to an end, Fr. Joseph reflects with his sister and brother in-law about their Catholic faith, agricultural work, and daily lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Divine Mercy Chaplet For Kids
channel.desc: Animated devotional special for children as Saint Faustina teaches Kristin, Eva, Enrique and Joseph how to pray the Chaplet, an explanation of the Divine Mercy Image and the importance of Confession. (30 minutes).[(96057)]
